function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Derivation of green space variable not well described","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"35 cohort studies and 69 cross-sectional studies, including 18 large scale ecological studies, may increase the risk of disease transmission due to the close contact and interactions among participants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assessments of quality were initially made by one reviewer and then cross-checked by another, potentially leading to discrepancies in identifying risks of disease transmission in the study environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close interactions and discussions during the consensus process for quality assessments may pose a risk of disease transmission among the individuals involved.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to urban or indoor environments without green spaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of greenspace in healthcare settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small sample sizes in studies on forest bathing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recent growth in interest in greenspace and health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Papers and documents not written in english","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in size of populations under investigation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Authors not presenting required data for meta-analysis","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High heterogeneity in study populations, design, and exposure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Studies with high risk of bias or low quality not excluded from sensitivity analysis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear definition of terms such as ’neighbourhood environment’ and ’built environment’ may lead to inconsistent inclusion or exclusion of studies related to contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate piloting of data extraction sheet may result in incomplete or inaccurate recording of study details, leading to potential data errors and bias in the synthesis and analysis.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Publication bias or selective reporting in meta-analysis may lead to an inaccurate estimation of the association between greenspace and contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of communicable diseases from the review may overlook the impact of greenspace on disease transmission and propagation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of mental health from the review may neglect the potential mental health benefits of greenspace, impacting overall well-being and quality of life.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited scope may result in overlooking the impact of greenspace on certain health outcomes, leading to incomplete evidence for decision-making.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through contact with nature and outdoor environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for spread of contagious diseases in congested greenspaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate management of waste and sanitation in greenspaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education on disease prevention in greenspaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low-income neighborhoods have reduced greenspace availability, leading to lower use of greenspaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Park quality and frequency of park use are higher among high-socioeconomic status ses residents","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Living in a greener neighborhood is linked with stronger greenspace-health associations and lower income-related health inequalities","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased access to greenspaces in urban areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration between health care providers and local nature partnerships","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases in densely populated areas such as metropolitan contexts and sub-regional realities with widespread urbanization.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty and temporary interventions in the housing sector due to the pandemic, leading to potential disruptions in the sharing economy and real estate market.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support for digital transformation processes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate integration of spatially blind policies and local ones","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration between real estate interests and social value in urban regeneration processes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of healthcare trace and tracking in epidemiological management.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proximity economies and place-based perspective in economic development policies.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of innovation in public policies for reusing and sharing commercial spaces.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity-based placemaking approach may lead to close contact and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene and sanitation practices in public spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity and interaction in public spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of guidance and planning in placemaking initiatives","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Members joining the cooperative voluntarily may introduce contagious diseases into the company’s environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Operation of a research laboratory, store, and food/agriculture laboratory may create environments conducive to disease transmission if proper health and safety measures are not observed.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reshaping the spatial dimension of neighborhoods and proximity economies may lead to increased population density and inadequate infrastructure for disease control.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordinated innovation in territorial development may hinder progress in local productivity structures.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate promotion of alternative technologies with low environmental impact may lead to unsustainable development practices.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of feasibility studies and planning for the implementation of innovative projects may result in ineffective and unsustainable outcomes.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Installation and maintenance of photovoltaic panels on public and private buildings may pose a risk of physical accidents or falls during the construction and upkeep of the systems.","category":"Health and Safety risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multi-utility structure including distribution and supply of fuel gases and water resources increases the risk of contamination and waterborne diseases if not managed properly.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of profits for urban regeneration interventions may lead to unintended consequences such as displacing vulnerable communities or disrupting natural habitats, potentially affecting the well-being of the population.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity-based entrepreneurial innovations may lead to increased interaction and exposure among individuals, potentially contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
